005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IFeatureModelConstrained;
009
010import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014public interface IAssemblyDefinition
015    extends IModelDefinition, IContainerModelAssembly, IAssembly, IFeatureModelConstrained {
016  QName MODEL_QNAME = new QName(IModule.XML_NAMESPACE, "model");
017
018  /**
019   * Check if the assembly is a top-level root assembly.
020   *
021   * @return {@code true} if the assembly is a top-level root, or {@code false}
022   *         otherwise
023   */
024  default boolean isRoot() {
025    // not a root by default
026    return false;
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Get the root name if this assembly is a top-level root.
031   *
032   * @return the root name if this assembly is a top-level root, or {@code null}
033   *         otherwise
034   */
035  @Nullable
036  default String getRootName() {
037    // not a root by default
038    return null;
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Get the root index to use for binary data, if this assembly is a top-level
043   * root.
044   *
045   * @return the root index if provided and this assembly is a top-level root, or
046   *         {@code null} otherwise
047   */
048  @Nullable
049  default Integer getRootIndex() {
050    // not a root by default
051    return null;
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Get the XML qualified name to use in XML as the root element.
056   *
057   * @return the root XML qualified name if this assembly is a top-level root, or
058   *         {@code null} otherwise
059   */
060  default QName getRootXmlQName() {
061    QName retval = null;
062    String rootName = getRootName();
063    if (rootName != null) {
064      retval = getContainingModule().toModelQName(rootName);
065    }
066    return retval;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Get the name used for the associated property in JSON/YAML.
071   *
072   * @return the root JSON property name if this assembly is a top-level root, or
073   *         {@code null} otherwise
074   */
075  default String getRootJsonName() {
076    return getRootName();
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  default IAssemblyInstance getInlineInstance() {
081    // not inline by default
082    return null;
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  default IAssemblyDefinition getOwningDefinition() {
087    return this;
088  }
089  //
090  // @Override
091  // default IAssemblyNodeItem getNodeItem() {
092  // return null;
093  // }
094
095  @Override
096  default boolean hasChildren() {
097    return IModelDefinition.super.hasChildren() || IContainerModelAssembly.super.hasChildren();
098  }
099}
